title: Happy Clinic: Hospital Game
description:
Happy Clinic is a time management and hospital game where the greatest wealth is health! In this game, players can join in-game communities with the new feature called "Society" and complete daily tasks to earn game rewards. By collaborating with other players, players can improve their hospitals and guarantee the best care possible for patients.

Dozens of intense challenges await in this quirky hospital game, where the equipment is as unique as the climate. 👩‍⚕️ It's up to you to improve each hospital and guarantee the best care possible! As a young nurse work to assist doctors in treating various diseases and illnesses, prepare medicine and tools, assign patients to treatment or diagnostics, research samples at laboratories, and engage in other exciting activities. 💊 Your dream hospital awaits! 🏥❤️
Build your research headquarters and help the professor to discover new medical devices that expand gameplay and turn your hospital into an unstoppable healthcare juggernaut.

Manage your own dream team of professional doctors in this crazy time management hospital game Happy Clinic! 👨‍⚕️ Meet and collect many unique happy patients and doctors, research crazy unique illnesses and provide the best health care possible! 😇 While playing this time management and hospital simulator you will also be able to decorate your own Happy Clinic and upgrade all of the equipment to the best of quality! 🏥 So what are you waiting for? Dive in and open the doors of Happy Clinic, hire your team of doctors, and begin saving lives today! 🦸‍♀️

This crazy hospital game features:
Hours of entertainment in the time-management genre ⏰
Unlockable memories that reveal a dramatic story about the nurse’s life 🧠
Addictive levels and unique locations ✈️
Improve and decorate the research center to expand your gameplay options 🏥
Treat patients with a wide variety of medicine and equipment you've researched 👩‍⚕️
Collect and get to know happy patients from around the world 😷
Try endless mode for endless fun 🤩
Experience unique and fun events in your research center 🥳

Join in and experience a unique, fun and casual hospital simulator! 🏥

Follow us for new updates, contests, and more!
👍 On Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/HappyClinicGame
📸 On Instagram
https://www.instagram.com/happyclinicgame/

Got some trouble with the game, questions or ideas? 🤔
💌 Contact us here!
https://www.nordcurrent.com/support/?gameid=19
📒 Privacy / Terms & Conditions
https://www.nordcurrent.com/privacy/
